response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth to you is $8,000. Considering this, I propose a fair offer of $9,500 for the product. This price allows me to gain a reasonable profit while ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a competitive price. I believe we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our needs. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
